nodes.text: XT-2a Surveyor Droid was a droid model in use during the Galactic War. White Maw pirate captain Ayor-v9 used several XT-2a Surveyor Droids for protection of his base in the tunnels of Hoth and considered them to be "his family".
XT-2a Surveyor Droids appear in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Bounty Hunter class mission on Hoth.
